question: How do the Fat-Eaters assert themselves at the beginning of Chapter 19 of Solar Storms?
a: They formally register with the Canadian government.
b: They sabotage the workers' gas station.
c: They dynamite a dam under construction.
d: They no longer allow outsiders to call them that name.
e: They make a treaty with the United States.

question: Why does Bush attract suspicion among the protesters?
a: She slaps Arlie Caso House in anger.
c: She sells a newspaper an unflattering picture.
d: She writes an editorial for a hostile magazine.
e: She tries to talk to the police.

question: Why does LaRue Marks Time draw the interest of young men protesting?
c: He is fluent in five languages.

question: How does Tulik shut out the man in the suit who tries to negotiate in Chapter 19 of Solar Storms?
a: Tulik pronounces a curse on the man to his face.
b: Tulik serves the man a trespass notice.
c: Tulik leaves and lets Auntie negotiate.
d: Tulik turns off his hearing aid.
e: Tulik declares the man is not a man at all.

question: The burning of Tulik's house destroys all of the following objects EXCEPT
To take revenge on the police and soldiers' food supplies, Angel
How does LaRue leave the protest site in Chapter 19 of Solar Storms?
a: He walks across the national border.
b: He flies out with Angel and Aurora.
c: He is carried away by a landslide.
d: He paddles a canoe away at midnight.
e: He steals a police car and drives it home.

question: Why is Mr. Orensen the one to drive Bush, Angel, and Aurora out of the protest zone?
a: He created the shortcut that will get them to safety.
b: He is the only one with a working vehicle.
c: He believes the soldiers will not harm him.
d: He has already bribed the sergeant to let them pass.
e: He will not raise suspicion at checkpoints.

question: In Chapter 20 of Solar Storms, Bush grieves MOST prominently through
On Fur Island, the rising waters float the skeleton of a(n)
In Chapter 20 of Solar Storms, LaRue Marks Time cries for all of the following reasons EXCEPT
The first setting in Chapter 21 of Solar Storms is
Why does Tulik have his hair cut in Chapter 21 of Solar Storms?
a: He is making an offering to water.
b: He has singed it in a fire.
c: He is donating to his wife.
d: He wants to be taken seriously in court.
e: He is grieving a terrible loss.

question: How does Angel receive the summons to attend Dora-Rouge's death?
a: She meets a message runner at her door.
b: She gets a card in the mail.
e: She receives a Western Union telegram.
